text: 8.4: Wkp 14.1-32; Mt 9.30; Mk 5.43; 7.36; Ru 5.14; 17.14Mba guma fhav ŋgarigim, Zisas mbaram khaŋ ana nzuai, “Ndu tuituigira wo ganɨri. Ndu won hɨgi bigeŋ bun harigi guma the suaŋ thari. Ndu ŋgɨp wo fhavar mba Fhe Bakɨme rotu gari guman pana khɨvav, ndu mba Moses fhum muun zav suaŋgi shaman muuŋri. Ndu mba shaman muuŋrim, mba gumgi gu mbigi ndu gangip kaŋgirga, ndun rɨmrɨm vhɨzgi.”
